scripts.build:test: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack test/index.js test/tests.js
scripts.build:dev: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js lib/circus.js
scripts.build:prod: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js lib/circus.js
scripts.build: npm run build:test && npm test && npm run build:prod
scripts.build:watch: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack --watch src/index.js lib/circus.js
